scripts.setup:tools: npm ci && npm run composer install
scripts.lintFix: prettier --write --list-different . && npm run lintFix:scripts && npm run lintFix:styles
scripts.i18n:pot: npm run wp-cli "wp i18n make-pot wp-content/themes/mytheme wp-content/themes/mytheme/lang/mytheme.pot --skip-theme-json"
scripts.i18n:compile: npm run wp-cli "wp i18n make-mo wp-content/themes/mytheme/lang wp-content/themes/mytheme/lang"
scripts.i18n:update: npm run wp-cli "wp i18n update-po wp-content/themes/mytheme/lang/mytheme.pot wp-content/themes/mytheme/lang"
